list_translation_mean.translate_mean: đường bị cảnh sát cô lập

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a line or circle of police, soldiers, or guards preventing access to or from an area or building.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: troops threw a cordon around the headquarters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Quân đội đã ném một sợi dây quanh trụ sở

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: prevent access to or from an area or building by surrounding it with police or other guards.
